name: Vietnam War io (opoly)
description:
Vietnam War io is a property trading game. Vietnam War, also known as the "Resistance War Against America" or the "American War," was a Cold War-era war that took place in Vietnam, Cambodia, and Laos from November 1955 to April 1975. This war was fought between the governments of North Vietnam (supported mostly by the Soviet Union and China) and South Vietnam (supported by the United States and other non-communist allies). Learn about the Vietnam War as you Collect and Trade opposing War Leaders, Generals, Countries, all the while trying to avoid paying War Funds or becoming a Casualty of War.

Optional Game Features:

* 2D/2.5D/3D play modes
* Customize your player cards
* Change player names
* Increase or decrease the amount of money played in the game
